TASK: Change display brightness
DOMAIN: settings

STEPS:
1. Click on the Start menu to access Windows settings
   REASONING: The Start menu provides access to the Settings application where display brightness can be adjusted
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.02, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Start menu to open
   REASONING: Allow time for the Start menu animation and UI elements to fully load
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

3. Click on the Settings icon in the Start menu
   REASONING: The Settings application contains all system configuration options including display settings
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.08, y=0.88)

4. Wait for Settings application to launch
   REASONING: Allow the Settings window to fully open and render all menu options
   ACTION: WAIT(1.5)

5. Click on the System category
   REASONING: Display brightness settings are located under the System category in Windows Settings
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.25, y=0.15)

6. Wait for System settings to load
   REASONING: Allow the System settings page to fully load and display all available options
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

7. Click on Display in the left sidebar
   REASONING: Display settings contain the brightness control slider and related options
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.20)

8. Wait for Display settings to appear
   REASONING: Allow the display settings panel to load with the brightness slider visible
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

9. Locate and adjust the brightness slider
   REASONING: The brightness slider allows direct adjustment of screen brightness level. Dragging it changes the brightness percentage
   ACTION: DRAG(start_x=0.50, start_y=0.35, end_x=0.65, end_y=0.35)

10. Wait for brightness change to take effect
    REASONING: Allow the system to apply the new brightness setting to the display
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

11. Task completed successfully
    REASONING: The display brightness has been adjusted using the Settings application
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: The display brightness should be successfully changed to a new level. The screen will be noticeably brighter or dimmer depending on the direction the slider was moved. The brightness slider in the Settings app will show the new brightness percentage value, and the change will be immediately visible on the screen.
